dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
F. Codevilla
A. Lopez
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: The DCI dataset is designed to evaluate the performance of vehicle detection models in diverse scenarios, covering 7 continuous and 1 discrete scenes, with over 40 angles, 20 distances, and 20,000 positions.
dcterms:title: DCI Dataset (Discrete and Continuous Instant-level Dataset)
